name: Find The Cookie (rdotdev)
description:
A game about hide and seek where you find the cookies and roll the dice to see how the game gets laid out for you. Based on randomness.

Everything is procedurally generated which means that its completely different for everyone. As in, the terrain height map, the cookie spawn locations and spawn numbers, the tree spawn location, and also the mob spawn locations, numbers spawned, and path given to roam. This allows uniqueness for everyone, and also replayability.
